markdownRemark.html:
Today I learned about issues working across teams as a tech lead.

Challenges of sharing a project with another team when you are team lead

  • Communication!
  • Different processes lead to lack of alignment
  • Different standards / different understandings of goals and what does “done” mean
  • Not just handling different developers handling multiple designers, multiple PM’s, multiple managers
  • You have to check multiple developers work - the product still reflects on you
